summary: You can now buy enchanted or unenchanted Telvanni robes from Neloth, and random Dunmer outfits and shoes from Fethis at the Raven Rock market place.
descriptionHtml:
[b]**REQUIRES THE DRAGONBORN DLC TO FUNCTION**[/b]

This is just a simple little fix for a problem, that has been causing me to loose immersion in the game. I guessed that I am not the only one, who does not like the idea of having to loot your Great House\'s robes from someone else, so I decided to make this little mod and share it.

[b]WHAT THIS MOD DOES[/b]
- It makes the following items purchasable from Neloth in Tel Mithryn (prices with no speech perks): [list]
[*] Unenchanted Telvanni Robes (209 septims),
[*] Unenchanted Telvanni Shoes (34 septims),
[*] Telvanni Robes enchanted with the regular (but just a tad more powerful) enchantment (419 septims),
[*] Telvanni Robes with the same enchantment as the Arch Mage\'s robes (7603 septims),
[*] Telvani Shoes, with a shock resistance enchantment (2558 septims)[/list]

- And the following from Fethis in Raven Rock (prices with no speech perks):
[list][*] Dunmer outfit (enchanted, various colours, with or without the hood) (225 septims),
[*] Dunmer shoes (enchanted) (70 septims)[/list]
author: Rajti15

files.name: Purchasable Telvanni and Dunmer outfits for the Dragonborn DLC
files.fileName: Purchasable Telvanni and Dunmer outfits for the Dragonborn DLC-31482-1-0.zip
